sense.def:
To summon someone
pomeni ukazati nekomu, naj pride k nam.

seg.quote: He was summoned to report on the accident.

sense.def:
To summon up one's strength or courage
pomeni potruditi se, da smo močni ali pogumni.

seg.quote: He eventually summoned up the courage to ask them if Melanie was all right.
...if you can't summon up enough energy to get up early.
